about_the_game:
The pack of dogs is vying for dominance in the park. Choose your dog and skills to be the one. Pee all over the map, eliminate your opponents and become the alpha dog.
Picture new strategies, adapt to the opponents and game modes and win on all the cups in this disruptive 3D action game with touches of MOBA and battle royale, where your skills will lead you to victory.

FEATURES AND CONTENT

CHOOSE YOUR SETUP

  • 16 different skills to win the game.
  • 8 dogs with unique passives with 3 variations per dog for different playstyles.
  • 13440 possible combinations to choose from and adapt to your strategy.
  • 100+ customizables you can personalize your dogs to exactly how you have imagined.
  • 2 different ways to win the game: pee on territory or eliminate your rivals. Choose yours or combine them both!

4 GAME MODES AND 16 ARENAS

  • Domination arenas: Charge the fire hydrant with your pee and beware of the cars driving alone the streets in the urban arenas.
  • Soccer arenas: Team up with other dog and score a goal for your team in the team game mode in the soccer courts.
  • Battle royale arena: Be the last dog and try not to drown while the sea steals ground from this tropical resort island, reducing the gameplay field.
  • Torii race arena: Race for the torii buffs and trigger demigod mode in the pretty gardens with asian inspiration.
  • Gain game modes objectives to upgrade your skills using power ups making them gigantic, awesome and powerful.

name: DOBA - Dogs Battle Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: All urban packs of dogs need an alpha, and when it comes to rule over parks, dogs have their own ways! Splat pee all around to claim territory or knock your rivals using your crafted set of the craziest skills ever found in a battle arena.
